data.answer: The existence of isolated Zn ions in the pores.

data.question: Why was the PXRD pattern measured for FDM-4 after CO oxidation?
data.answer: To confirm the MOF retains its structure during the reactions.

data.question: What was the purpose of using DRIFTS in the study of FDM-3?
data.answer: To study the interaction between CO and Cu sites in the MOF.

data.question: Why was H2O2 decomposition experiment performed with FDM-4?
data.answer: To evaluate the catalytic performance of the MOF in H2O2 decomposition.

data.question: What was the role of TEMPO in the alcohol oxidation experiments?
data.answer: As a cocatalyst in the aerobic oxidation of benzyl alcohol.
